column1: Subject: Labour, Employment, Wages and Productivity
Topic : Wages and Income from Work
Title  : M183521 - Average Weekly Paid Hours Worked Per Employee By Industry, Annual

1) Before 2006, data pertain to private sector establishments each with at least 25 employees.  From 2006 onwards, it includes the public sector.  2) Annual figures are the simple averages of the figures obtained at quarterly intervals.  3) Data are based on SSIC1996(1990-1999), SSIC2005(2000-2005), SSIC2015(2006-current).
OTHERS - INCLUDES AGRICULTURE, FISHING, QUARRYING, UTILITIES AND SEWAGE & WASTE MANAGEMENT.
